title: What Is a 3PL? A Plain-English Guide for DTC Founders Who Are Done Shipping From Their Garage
brief: Define third-party logistics in practical terms for early-stage DTC founders and CPG operators, explaining when it makes sense to outsource fulfillment and what to expect from a 3PL partner. This post seeds ShipDudes as a trusted educational voice and captures high-volume top-of-funnel search traffic.

This post positions ShipDudes as a transparent, founder-friendly alternative to opaque enterprise 3PLs.

title: 3PL vs. In-House Fulfillment: The Real Cost Breakdown for Growing DTC Brands
